local_intent: Pull the grasped drawer handle along +x by 0.2 m and verify the drawer is open.
assumptions: Handle is already grasped and TCP yaw is set for a straight pull
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer step of the global plan: with a stable grasp, execute MoveDelta(x, 0.2, 1500) to open the drawer and confirm via ContainerOpen.
